quotes.text: Il libro della natura è scritto in lingua matematica.

quotes.author: Roger Penrose
quotes.text: Thus, Gödel appears to have taken it as evident that the physical brain must itself behave computationally, but that the mind is something beyond the brain, so that the mind's action is not constrained to behave according to the computational laws that he believed must control the physical brain's behavior.

quotes.author: Henry Marsh
quotes.text: Artificial intelligence has problems. The biggest is that brains are nothing like computers.
